snippet: Joey Barton has made a swift return to Burnley after the midfielder agreed to rejoin the club until the end of the season on a free transfer in January, the Premier League side said on its website....

headline.main: Barton Agrees Deal for Burnley Return
headline.print_headline: Barton Agrees Deal for Burnley Return

lead_paragraph: Joey Barton has made a swift return to Burnley after the midfielder agreed to rejoin the club until the end of the season on a free transfer in January, the Premier League side said on its website.

snippet: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku is on the brink of a sealing a new deal with the Premier League club, the Belgian's agent Mino Raiola has said....

snippet: Striker Islam Slimani scored the only goal as champions Leicester City beat West Ham United 1-0 on Saturday to climb six points clear of the Premier League relegation zone....

snippet: Brazilian international midfielder Oscar will join Chinese club Shanghai SIPG from Chelsea, the English Premier League club said on its website on Friday....

snippet: New Aston Villa manager Roberto Di Matteo has warned that his side face a tough task returning to the Premier League at the first attempt after last season's relegation....

snippet: Everton will be without midfielder James McCarthy for up to three weeks while goalkeeper Maarten Stekelenburg is unlikely to recover in time for Monday's Premier League trip to Leicester City....

headline.main: Everton's McCarthy, Stekelenburg to Miss Leicester Clash
headline.print_headline: Everton's McCarthy, Stekelenburg to Miss Leicester Clash

lead_paragraph: Everton will be without midfielder James McCarthy for up to three weeks while goalkeeper Maarten Stekelenburg is unlikely to recover in time for Monday's Premier League trip to Leicester City.

snippet: David Moyes said his plans to strengthen Sunderland's squad in January to boost the club's chances of Premier League survival have been foiled after chief executive Martin Bain revealed the manager will not be able to bring in players....

lead_paragraph: David Moyes said his plans to strengthen Sunderland's squad in January to boost the club's chances of Premier League survival have been foiled after chief executive Martin Bain revealed the manager will not be able to bring in players.

snippet: West Brom defender Gareth McAuley is keen to extend his stint at the Premier League club for at least another season but is in no rush to start negotiations about a fresh deal....

headline.print_headline: West Brom's McAuley Relaxed Over Future

lead_paragraph: West Brom defender Gareth McAuley is keen to extend his stint at the Premier League club for at least another season but is in no rush to start negotiations about a fresh deal.
